channel.title: Lady Blackbird (2-shot)
channel.description:
Everyone talks about how great Lady Blackbird is, but I have never played it, so I have created a 2-shot in April to try it out.
[date=2020-04-21 time=08:00:00 format="LLLL" timezone="Australia/Perth"] → [date=2020-04-21 time=11:00:00 format="LLLL" timezone="Australia/Perth"] [Lady Blackbird, Session 1](https://gauntlet-hangouts.firebaseapp.com/event-detail/-M0fJ8PRPDhb2UxUP1Co) [date=2020-04-28 time=08:00:00 format="LLLL" timezone="Australia/Perth"] → [date=2020-04-28 time=11:00:00 format="LLLL" timezone="Australia/Perth"] [Lady Blackbird, Session 2](https://gauntlet-hangouts.firebaseapp.com/event-detail/-M0fJJX6dAq_JcmSZEvf)
The game will be taught as we play and will hopefully be recorded on Streamyard but only released if all players agree.
**Safety tools** : We will be using the X-card & lines and veils. We can change these tools to whatever suits the table best.

item.title: Lady Blackbird (2-shot)
item.dc:creator: @cordinc
item.description:
@cordinc wrote:

Thanks Wilhelm, I will definitely give that a good read!

Read full topic

item.title: Lady Blackbird (2-shot)
item.dc:creator: @Wilhelm
item.description:
@Wilhelm wrote:

If you’re playing Lady Blackbird for the first time you might want to take a peek at the GM guide I wrote for it back in the day. https://wilper.wordpress.com/2010/04/21/playing-lady-blackbird-by-john-harper/

Read full topic

item.title: Lady Blackbird (2-shot)
item.dc:creator: @cordinc
item.description:
@cordinc wrote:

Everyone talks about how great Lady Blackbird is, but I have never played it, so I have created a 2-shot in April to try it out.

Tuesday, April 21, 2020 12:00 AM → Tuesday, April 21, 2020 3:00 AM Lady Blackbird, Session 1
Tuesday, April 28, 2020 12:00 AM → Tuesday, April 28, 2020 3:00 AM Lady Blackbird, Session 2

The game will be taught as we play and will hopefully be recorded on Streamyard but only released if all players agree.

Safety tools : We will be using the X-card & lines and veils. We can change these tools to whatever suits the table best.
